title: Selection and Installation of System
fullText: The selection, installation, and control of electrical equipment that is intended to form an electricity generation system shall comply with the following Standards: (a) Engine-driven generating sets ........................................ AS/NZS 3010. (b) Stand-alone power systems ........... AS/NZS 4509 (series). (c) Battery systems ............................ AS 3011 (series) and AS/NZS 5139. (d) Photovoltaic array systems ............................................... AS/NZS 5033. (e) Inverter systems ............................................... AS/NZS 4777 (series).
